113  class SimpleKalmanFilter
114  {
115  public:
116 
118  SimpleKalmanFilter()
119  : xhat(1,0.0), P(1,1,0.0), xhatminus(1,0.0), Pminus(1,1,0.0) {};
120 
121 
129  SimpleKalmanFilter( const Vector<double>& initialState,
130  const Matrix<double>& initialErrorCovariance )
131  : xhat(initialState), P(initialErrorCovariance),
132  xhatminus(initialState.size(), 0.0),
133  Pminus( initialErrorCovariance.rows(),
134  initialErrorCovariance.cols(), 0.0) {};
135 
136 
144  SimpleKalmanFilter( const double& initialValue,
145  const double& initialErrorVariance )
146  : xhat(1,initialValue),
147  P(1,1,initialErrorVariance), xhatminus(1,0.0),
148  Pminus(1,1,0.0) {};

289  virtual int TimeUpdate()

305  virtual int TimeUpdate( const Matrix<double>& phiMatrix,
306  const Matrix<double>& processNoiseCovariance )
307  throw(InvalidSolver)
308  { return Predict(phiMatrix,xhat,processNoiseCovariance); }
